price: 43. Endurer et pardonner, voilà bien la meilleure résolution (à prendre).
arabic: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaman ṣabara waghafara inna dhālika lamin ʿazmi al-umūri
